channel.title: (317) Help with npc animations
channel.description: Hello, I need help with npc animations. When i fight my goblin he don't attack with the hand he 'fly' in me and when he gonna dead he keep standing and then a green line comes and he go away I really need your help ps:soz for my english :)

item.title: (317) Help with npc animations
item.dc:creator: @wartek wartek
item.description:
@wartek wrote:

Hello,
I need help with npc animations.
When i fight my goblin he don’t attack with the hand he ‘fly’ in me and when he gonna dead he keep standing and then a green line comes and he go away
I really need your help
ps:soz for my english
